CustomField.description: Enables contact creation for that event. If "Enable Account Search" is not checked, contacts created will be added to the primary registrant's account or into an individual person account depending on if the "Enable Individual Accounts" setting is active.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enables contact creation for that event. If "Enable Account Search" is not checked, contacts created will be added to the primary registrant's account or into an individual person account depending on if the "Enable Individual Accounts" setting is active.
CustomField.label: Create Contacts for Attendees
